message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $70?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $70 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $85.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $85, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
